column5: I can't for the life of me find in the regs where it states how many lines you are permitted, I know its 2 in Lake O. I'm told its 2 in Lake Erie...Can anyone enlighten me???
Page 17 Lake Erie... A person who is angling from a boat may use two (2) lines in the waters of Lake Erie..except in Rondeau Bay and the inner bay of Long Point Bay
